pages.text: Nandao chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo], bing cong tiandi jian wei nimen tigong jiyang de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba!”
Ni shuo:“Chu an la wai, tiandi jian wu ren neng zhidao wei jian zhi wu, tamen ye bu zhidao ziji he shi bei fuhuo.”
Bu, shi tamen dui houshi de zhishi yi wu suo zhi. Bu, shi tamen zai huaiyi houshi. Bu, shi tamen kan bujian houshi.
Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Nandao women he women de zuxian [si hou] bian cheng chentu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Yiqian, women he women de zuxian que yi shouguo ci lei jinggao. Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Nimen dang zai da dishang luxing, guancha fanzui zhe de jieju ruhe!”
Ni buyao wei tamen [de beini] beishang, ni buyao wei tamen suo shuanong de yinmou kunao.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Jiaru ni [mu sheng] shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao he shi shixian ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de [xingfa], youxie yexu jianglin nimenle.”
Ni de zhu dui renlei que shi you hong en de, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu gan'en.
Fanshi tamen de xiongzhong suo yincang de he tamen suo gongkai de, ni de zhu quanzhidao.
Tiandi jian de yiqie yincang zhi wu, dou yi jilu zai yi bu mingbai de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” dique yi ba yiselie de houyi suo zhenglun de da bufen shiyou gaosu tamen [zhu].
